articles.description: Kali Uchis' 'Orquídeas,' her second Spanish-language and fourth overall LP, moves from merengue to sultry pop in an open letter to love and life.
articles.content:
Kali Uchis has built her career on taking risks. 
With “Orquídeas,” her second Spanish-language album (and fourth overall), Uchis asks her collaborators — which range from global superstars Peso Plu… [+7691 chars]
